entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
